title: The Pros and Cons of Web Components, Via Lit and Shoelace
author: David Eastman
description: If you are working in or leading a larger web implementation team, make sure you understand the possible benefits of a web component library.
cntitle: 通过 Lit 和 Shoelace 了解 Web Components 的优缺点
cndescription: 如果您在更大的 Web 实现团队中工作或领导该团队，请确保您了解 Web 组件库的可能优势。
